thread.title: Pixel Film Studios Releases Corporate Stock Footage
thread.title_full: Pixel Film Studios Releases Corporate Stock Footage - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Pixel Film Studios Releases Corporate Stock Footage
text:
FCPX Effects Developer Pixel Film Studios announced the release of Corporate Stock Footage .
Aliso Viejo, CA (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Pixel Film Studios has announced a new division. In addition to Final Cut Pro X effects and plugins, Pixel Film Studios will now offer stock footage . This first release of stock footage includes over one thousand different corporate clips. The stock footage is available in HD, 4K and 5K.
Pixel Film Studios offers competitive pricing. The HD versions cost $14.95 per clip, 4K versions cost $19.95 and the 5K versions are only $24.95.
Corporate stock footage can be used for internal company use such as meetings, demonstration videos and conventions. Stock footage also is used in commercials and other media to save film makers time from have to film a particular scene.
Established in 2006, Aliso Viejo, California-based Pixel Film Studios is an innovative developer of visual effects tools for the post-production and broadcast community. Their products are integrated with popular non-linear editing and compositing products from Apple FCPX. Apple, the Apple logo, Mac OS X, and Macintosh are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. All other trademarks and trade names are the property of their respective owners.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13025361.htm
